Name: MSMQ - Create Transactional Queue
Description: Create one or more MSMQ transactional queues and configure permissions.
Author: fireydude

Parameters.Name: $MSMQQueues
Parameters.Label: Queue names
Parameters.HelpText: Queue names, separated by semicolons. Example: _Queue1;Queue2;Queue3_

Parameters.Name: $MSMQUsers
Parameters.Label: Queue users
Parameters.HelpText: Users with access to the queue separated by semicolons. Example: _DOMAIN\User1;DOMAIN\User2_

Parameters.Name: MSMQPermAllow
Parameters.Label: Allowed permissions
Parameters.HelpText: Permissions granted to the queue users, separated by semicolons. Example: _DeleteMessage;PeekMessage;ReceiveMessage_

Parameters.Name: MSMQAdminUsers
Parameters.Label: Admin queue users
Parameters.HelpText: Users with access to the queue separated by semicolons. Example: _DOMAIN\User1;DOMAIN\User2_

Parameters.Name: MSMQPermAdminAllow
Parameters.Label: Allowed admin permissions
Parameters.HelpText: Permissions granted to the queue admin users, separated by semicolons. Example: _DeleteMessage;PeekMessage;ReceiveMessage_

Parameters.Name: ResetPermissions
Parameters.Label: Reset Permissions
Parameters.HelpText: Remove all existing permissions from the Queue if it already exists

Parameters.Name: ResetDomains
Parameters.Label: Reset Permissions Domains
Parameters.HelpText:
This is used if Reset Permissions is set.
Example: YOURDOMAIN1;YOURDOMAIN2
